prompt: What do you think about the steak here?

responses.response: They're lovely.
Pretty tender.
They're okay, nothing special.
I've had better.

replies.good: Right? I was hoping you'd like them too.
replies.bad: Well, I think they're rather nice...

prompt: Were you just being polite, or did you actually like the appetizer?

responses.response: Not gonna lie, it was really good. I'd order it again.
Yeah, I liked it more than I expected.
It was fine. Not amazing, not awful.
I was totally faking it. That thing was weird.

replies.good: Okay, good! I wasn't sure if I was imagining how good it was.
replies.bad: Haha… I *thought* your face looked suspicious.

prompt: If you could only eat one thing from this menu forever, what would it be?

responses.response: The steak. I'd die happy with that.
Probably the burger. Solid choice every time.
Ugh, tough call. They're all mediocre.
Nothing here. I'd rather fast.

replies.good: Respect. That's a bold but delicious forever meal.
replies.bad: Ouch. Remind me not to bring you here again, ever.

prompt: I'm just realizing that this restaurant is quite clean. What do you think?

responses.response: Spotless. Really impressive!
Looks decently clean.
Not very clean, honestly.
These tables are gross.

replies.good: I'm glad you noticed — I was trying to pick a nice spot.
replies.bad: Ugh, I didn't think you'd notice... sorry.

prompt: What do you think of the service so far?

responses.response: Incredible. So friendly and fast.
Pretty solid, no complaints.
They seem busy, I get it.
Service is really slow today.

replies.good: I'm glad! I wanted tonight to feel a little special.
replies.bad: Yikes, not the impression I was hoping to make...

prompt: Okay, be honest — have we been waiting *too* long for everything, or am I just impatient?

responses.response: No, you're totally right. It's been kind of slow.
I noticed it too, but it's not bothering me.
I didn't even realize — I'm just enjoying the company.
Honestly? I'd wait all night if it means sitting here with you.

replies.good: That might be the smoothest thing anyone's said to me all year.
replies.bad: Ugh, right? I was starting to feel like I aged a year between courses.

prompt: What do you think about the music that's playing?

responses.response: Love it. Feels like it matches the whole vibe.
Pretty chill. I don't mind it at all.
It's kinda random, but not distracting.
What is this playlist? It's giving me whiplash.

replies.good: I thought you might like it — I actually checked the place's playlist online.
replies.bad: Okay, yeah… maybe the music's not doing us any favors.

prompt: If we were the only people here, would it feel romantic or creepy?

responses.response: Romantic, easily. It's got that quiet charm.
Depends on the lighting… but leaning romantic.
Maybe a bit too quiet. Creeps me out a little.
Total horror movie vibes. We'd be doomed.

replies.good: Okay, so I *can* imagine us renting the whole place.
replies.bad: Guess I'll scratch 'private dinner here' off my bucket list.

prompt: Does this place feel like a date spot, or more like somewhere you'd take your coworkers?

responses.response: Definitely a date spot. It's got that vibe.
I could see it going either way — but it's working tonight.
Hmm… feels a little too formal for a date, maybe.
Honestly? This screams 'office birthday lunch'.

replies.good: Okay, good! I was really hoping it'd feel intentional.
replies.bad: Brutal... next time I'll pick somewhere with fairy lights and acoustic covers.

prompt: You look really nice tonight, by the way.

responses.response: Aw, thank you! That's really sweet.
Thanks! You've dressed up pretty well yourself.
I didn't really try, but hey — appreciate it.
Oh. Uh… thanks, I guess.

replies.good: I mean it. You've got this glow tonight.
replies.bad: Haha... I'll stop embarrassing you now.

prompt: So, um, what do you think of my outfit?

responses.response: I love it! You look amazing.
It's nice, really suits you.
It's okay, I guess.
Not my favorite look on you.

replies.good: I thought you'd like it! I picked it out just for you.
replies.bad: Oh... I was hoping you'd like it.

prompt: Umm, do I have something in between my teeth?

responses.response: Nope, you look great. I checked the moment you smiled.
You're good. I was wondering the same about me though.
A little bit, yeah. Just there. No big deal.
Uh… yeah. It's been there a *while*.

replies.good: Thanks, you're a lifesaver. I think I'm able to trust you more now.
replies.bad: Oh no. That's going to haunt me until I sleep.

prompt: Can you be honest with me? How awkward has the date been so far?

responses.response: Not awkward at all! I'm having a great time.
It's been a little awkward, but in a cute way.
It's been a bit awkward, but I think it's okay.
Honestly? It's been super awkward.

replies.good: I'm so glad to hear that! I was getting worried.
replies.bad: Oh no... I thought we were doing okay.

prompt: Do you think that our waitress has a thing for you? I've caught her looking at you a few times...

responses.response: Haha, I think she was just being friendly.
Maybe? I didn't really notice.
I don't know, but it was a little weird.
Yeah, that was super awkward.

replies.good: I thought so too! I was getting a little jealous.
replies.bad: Haha, yeah... I was trying to ignore it.

prompt: Do I talk too much when I'm nervous?

responses.response: Honestly? It's super charming.
Maybe a little, but it's kinda cute.
You do talk a lot, but I'm listening.
Yeah, it's… a lot. I can barely get a word in.

replies.good: Okay good, because I was spiraling a bit there.
replies.bad: Noted... I'll try to breathe between sentences.
